ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.8"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67665-0" EMS Scene Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10732)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Scene" (CONF:10734)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10736)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10740)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10741)/@code="67481-2" EMS reporter is first unit on scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10742)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10743)
NEMSIS Trace: EScene.01
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10746)/@code="67481-2" Name of first unit on scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10745)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type ST (CONF:10747)
NEMSIS Trace: EScene.02

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:10738)
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:10748)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10750)/@code="67489-5" EMS Count of patients at scene (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10749)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type INT (CONF:10751)
NEMSIS Trace: EScene.06
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10753)/@code="67490-3" Mass Casualty Incident Indicator (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:10754)
NEMSIS Trace: EScene.07

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="eScene.09" Location type (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5 NEMSISCodeSystem)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value1 with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.90 ICD-10 CM)
